title: Grants Database
description: The Grants Database contains 946 results to 417 grantees between 2006 and 2025, specifically focusing on grants awarded in Kenya. It includes various grants such as the Hay Festival, Wartists, Inc. d/b/a ArtLords, Nuvision Media Limited, Twaweza East Africa Limited, and others, with amounts ranging from $10,000 to $2,015,000.
